```{r}
library(vroom)
library(tidyverse)
library(corrplot)
library(MASS)
library(nlme)

```

```{r}
ped <- vroom("ClassAssessment.txt")
ped$Semester <- as.factor(ped$Semester)
```

```{r}
summary(ped)

ped |>
```
